author: Francis Augusto Medeiros

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed fahrenheit conversion
Fixed number of forecasts when using fahrenheit

Added Fahrenheit as a display option (available under the app's settings).
Changed the font of the forecasts - please let me know if this is better for readability.

Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash on applite.
Added Wind Direction information.
Attempt to fix a bug where users of aplite watches were not getting weather info.

A few bugfixes and new features:
- Press select to alternate between precipitation (default), wind speed and sunrise/sunset
- the app warns when there is no bluetooth nor internet connection
- the app warns when there is a new version of the app available.
Fixed alignment and other minor cosmetic issues.
Changed the font used to display forecasts to improve readability.

This version seems to have fixed all the problems regarding other time zones. It seems the whole world can use this app now.
I would appreciate any feedback and suggestions.
Changed app name and added better weather symbols.

This is the first release of Wæthyr. It works well, though there are some problems with locations that are more than 5 hours difference in relation to GMT. 

To-do List:
- Improve the interface
- Check if yr.no sent a valid forecast
- Re-request weather forecast if the previous one was not valid
- Choose better icons
- Add colors to the Pebble Time interface
- Get a more reliable translation of yr.no's raw data.

title: Wæther - Weather information
